bufferStateChanged

void bufferStateChanged(Buffer buffer)
Called when a buffer's state has changed. I.e. the buffer has become dirty, or become clean, or has been selected, or has been unselected, or has become associated with a new file.

Parameters:
buffer - The buffer.
